sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import * as XLSX from "xlsx" const Invoices = () => { const [invoices, setInvoices] = useState([]) // Mock data for invoices const mockInvoices = [ { id: 1, invoiceNo: "INV202312001", date: "2023-12-01", supplier: "ABC Construction Materials", poNumber: "PO202312001", totalAmount: "250000.00", status: "Pending", dueDate: "2023-12-31", }, { id: 2, invoiceNo: "INV202312002", date: "2023-12-02", supplier: "XYZ Steel Suppliers", poNumber: "PO202312002", totalAmount: "4500000.00", status: "Paid", dueDate: "2023-12-30", }, { id: 3, invoiceNo: "INV202312003", date: "2023-12-03", supplier: "PQR Sand & Gravel", poNumber: "PO202312003", totalAmount: "300000.00", status: "Overdue", dueDate: "2023-11-30", }, ] useEffect(() => { const savedInvoices = localStorage.getItem("invoices") if (savedInvoices) { setInvoices(JSON.parse(savedInvoices)) } else { setInvoices(mockInvoices) localStorage.setItem("invoices", JSON.stringify(mockInvoices)) } }, []) const exportToExcel = () => { const worksheet = XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet(invoices) const workbook = XLSX.utils.book_new() XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(workbook, worksheet, "Invoices") XLSX.writeFile(workbook, "invoices.xlsx") } const getStatusClass = (status) => { switch (status.toLowerCase()) { case "paid": return "paid" case "pending": return "pending" case "overdue": return "overdue" default: return "pending" } } return (
🧾

Invoices

{invoices.map((invoice, index) => ( ))}
S.No Invoice No Date Supplier PO Number Total Amount (₹) Due Date Status Actions
{index + 1} {invoice.invoiceNo} {new Date(invoice.date).toLocaleDateString()} {invoice.supplier} {invoice.poNumber} ₹{invoice.totalAmount} {new Date(invoice.dueDate).toLocaleDateString()} {invoice.status}
{invoices.length === 0 && (

No invoices found

)}
) } export default Invoices
